channel.title: Black Mesa Crashed
channel.description: Im not sure of the chapter of the crash but right after you burn the huge creature and go down the ladder and it loads, it'll crash saying "HL2 stopped working" plus I have the mini dump crash files. Thanks. I do wish to play more of Black Mesa source. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T16_28_47C0.mdmp (100 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T16_32_6C0.mdmp (99.3 KB)

item.title: Black Mesa Crashed
item.dc:creator: cman2k
item.description:
Thanks for the crash dumps, we are looking at these issues! In the meantime, as a workaround you might try setting your shadows to lower quality, see if it helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Crashed
item.dc:creator: RedSpirit
item.description:
Im not sure of the chapter of the crash but right after you burn the huge creature and go down the ladder and it loads, it’ll crash saying “HL2 stopped working” plus I have the mini dump crash files.

Thanks. I do wish to play more of Black Mesa source.
